Author: The-Exploding-Girl
Text: It’s terrible realizing that a single comment is what fueled something so terrible and long lasting.   For me, I remember sitting at the kitchen table with my brother and grandpa. I had just started going through puberty so I had gained some weight after being skinny my whole life. My grandpa made a comment that I was getting “husky.” That’s what started it all. He’s German so he didn’t even mean it as an insult, in fact it might have even been a compliment, but I still think about it to this day (15yr later lol).
